Text:
Is this from the new Bluray of the film which came out on the 31st of May? Also, which version of Legend is this...?

Director's Cut = longer & soundtrack by Jerry Goldsmith

Theatrical = shorter & soundtrack by Tangerine Dream

Also, screencaps?

The title says HDTV and HDTV it is.
Director's cut was never released neither in BluRay nor as HDTV

HDTV rip....okay, just wanted to clarify as the new Bluray rips I haven't seen here yet

"Universal has released a Blu-ray version of the "Ultimate Edition" on May 31, 2011, which carries over all the content from the DVD, including the Jerry Goldsmith-scored "Director's Cut" and the Tangerine Dream-scored theatrical version."

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legend_%28film%29#Blu-Ray

Sorry man,
Result of bad research...
This is not a blu-ray rip, this is 90 mins version
BRrip will be soon available I hope.
MKV badly encoded, DOES NOT WORK WITH A MEDIA CENTER!
